title: Xi'an: Chinese city under lockdown as Covid cases rise
content:
1. Xi'an: Chinese city under lockdown as Covid cases rise  BBC News
  2. China orders lockdown of up to 13 million people in Xi'an  Yahoo News
  3. COVID-19 pandemic: China issues lockdown of 13 million people  Fox News
  4. One person caught the coronavirus. China locked down 200000 of their neighbors.  The Washington Post
  5. China Locks Down Xi’an, Issuing Stay-at-Home Order to 13 million  The Wall Street Journal
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
